definition: piece of paper with short note/short letter
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey

sentences.english: Calligraphy notepads are the best option for primary students that want to practice their writing.
sentences.chinese: 字帖兒最適合小學生用來模仿寫字。
